|blank_info = 46-14740 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267341 |website = City of Crooks |footnotes = }} Crooks is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Minnehaha County, and 1,362 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Crooks website Category:Cities in South Dakota
